title: I have a bug help me pls League of Legend staff or something
body: So I joined a Custom Game and this popped up http://prntscr.com/cmwkkh I  dont know why :( help me please

replies.body: Were there other players in the custom game?  The game will continue to go on if there are still other players participating.  It would be necessary for everyone to leave in order to return to the main screen of the client.  Hopefully, that helps clear things up!
